title: Organizational Development Practice Competency Enhancement: Instructor Control Levels and Learning Outcomes in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will distinguish and explain PBL task execution methods based on instructor control levels (low/medium/high).
Learners will measure the impact of structured instructor feedback in online environments on language project completion quality.
Learners will self-assess and comparatively analyze their perceived learning levels under three control conditions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
